summary: "Blackadder" is a funny British TV show with four seasons, set in different historical times. It stars Rowan Atkinson as the clever but bad guy, Edmund Blackadder, and Tony Robinson as his helpful friend, Baldrick. Each season has new characters, but some actors, like Stephen Fry and Tim McInnerny, appear in multiple seasons. The show was very popular and won many awards. People loved Atkinson's funny performance and the clever writing.
title: Blackadder
